name: LD50 - Return to Glade in the Sky
name_original: LD50 - Return to Glade in the Sky
description:
LD50 Submission

Recreation of my first LD game as a growth evaluation.

Controls:

  • keyboard
    • Move: Arrow Keys
    • Jump: X
    • Interact: C
    Controller
    • Move: L-Stick
    • Jump: X/A
    • Interact: Y/B
